website_summaries.verdict: The higher price tag gets you a scanner that's more reliable than the competition.
pros: This metal USB fingerprint scanner with a 6-foot USB cable is sleek and heavy, making it comfortable and easy to use
Windows Hello compatibility is a great feature
cons: The 6-foot cable makes this scanner great for desktops but not so much for laptops
Driver installation can be a bit of a hassle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Setup and Mostly Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add fingerprint-based Windows Hello support to my Dell Desktop, and this seems to work just fine. Setup in Windows 10 was easy. The unit itself is solid -- mostly metal -- and heavy, which is actually a good thing because it stays put on your desk. It just feels well made. I'm giving it 4 stars because often it takes more than one finger swipe to login. Not terrible, but I would like it if it was able to get it on the first try more often.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Professional Reliable Biometric Logon for Windows 10 & Password Manager
customer_reviews.text: SCANNER: Quick & Accurate! 500 DPI. Scratch resistant coating similar to Gorilla Glass. INSTALL: Works flawlessly with WINDOWS 10. Installation was extremely easy. Step by step instructions and updated drivers (32/64 bit) can be downloaded from the helpful support page: [...] Build Quality: EXCELLENT Scanner: 500 dpi. Scratch resistant coating similar to Gorilla Glass Base: Aluminum. Nice weight. Front & Rear full length rubber foot pads keep it in place during use. Footprint: 2.75 inches X 1.75 inches X 0.7 inches. USB cord: non-detachable, 6' length. Computer logon: No need to navigate away from the PIN logon field. Just scan your finger and you're in. Password Manager: Roboform integration is easy, but obviously you'll need to purchase the full-version.
customer_reviews.author: PlanetAnonymous

customer_reviews.title: I guess it just can't do what I want it to do
customer_reviews.text: What I wanted was a finger print reader I could use on my windows 10 computer to sign into web sites like I do on my Cell phone. I guess it is just not capable of doing that. It seems like it may be a limitation of the various browsers. I tried it with several and couldn't get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a reader I had been using for years on win7 but did not have drivers out at the time I needed to upgrade to win10. The other day my machine rebooted while I was away from my desk and this reader no longer worked. After a bit of investigation, I found that is was a driver error and seemed to trace back to the Verifi. When I plug it in now I get a windows error. It seems to be failed hardware. I only got 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mash5boom

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and set up. Windows 10 detected and installed drivers immediately. And windows hello setup was very simple. It's pretty reliable too. You do have to be on the pin/password entry screen before swiping your fingerprint. The cord is plenty long too so that I can drape it down the back of my desk and down to my computer below. The friction padding does an ok job of keeping it from moving
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Most of the time it responds quickly and reads the first time. Occasionally I need to swipe twice or three times. I do have to get my desktop computer half-woke though; it goes into a sort of sleep (not actual sleep like a laptop, just to where it displays images with less or no text, maybe no clock display) and won't read the fingerprint reader. So often I have to smack a key or click the mouse and then go for the fingerprint reader, and if I do it too quickly it won't read it. That's all something most people will train themselves around readily enough. Overall it works great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gleason

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: This reader does not work with administrator account in windows 10. It is not easy to install and gives you only temporary access if you do not purchase other software. It is not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Renzi

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Granted, this is day one... Computer has Windows 10 Pro 64 bit. I plugged the finger print into USB port, Windows discovered it and loaded drivers immediately. Next went into Windows Hello and configured. It took three swipes to get finger print recognized. Then, it simply worked. I locked the computer and logged back in instantly. Restarted the computer and logged in with finger print as expected. No issues at all. Did not use the mini optical disk at all, it is still in its storage envelop. I have not addressed any other possible logins like email as yet. Will try that later. For now, it is fully functional. The build quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: David L Klinger

customer_reviews.title: VIRUS IN THE SOFTWARE INSTALLER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: VIRUS IN THE SOFTWARE INSTALLER!! SecureWorks Red Cloak found the virus, when the installer was analyzed by VirusTotal, 17 AV engines saw the installer as malicious, showing that it contained a Trojan.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma Resources

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year
customer_reviews.text: I got this end of last year. For the last few weeks when I open Roboform to login, I heard the USB disconnect sound and had to wait a few minutes, then it would reconnect and work. Now it just gives an error in Device Manager. I have tried different ports and a different PC. I will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Access Denied

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: bought it followed install and set up. made sure windows 10 biometric was turned on still did not work. tried to contact their support to resolved the problem no luck they just sent me the same instructions as before. product comes with mini set up disk took 3 tries to get it to read. i know it wasn't my desktop because i had just finish downloading my quicken software. sending it back for a credit also the roboform password software is not user friendly i don't offen right reviews but this was a rip off BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Dave L schamehorn

customer_reviews.title: Works just like it should (Windows 8
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it should (Windows 8.1). No driver issues, never an issue reading my fingerprint. Only annoyance is that sometimes Windows makes a "USB device disconnected" noise every once in a while. This is solved by going to Device Manager > Biometric Devices > AuthenTec > Properties > Power Management and DISABLING the checkbox "Allow the computer to turn off this device to save power."
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: I love this.
customer_reviews.text: I've actually been using this for quite some time. The only issues I've had with it was when I don't run my finger tip over the sensor correctly. Otherwise, it works great. I use it with Windows 10 and it is a little difficult to setup, but that is on the "Windows Hello" side, not the reader. For testing purposes, I used different fingers, and it has no trouble telling the difference between my index and middle fingers.
customer_reviews.author: M. Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use this with Windows 10 Hello for PC login as well as my password vault app (Dashlane) and it works reliably well, even with my worn 74-tear-old fingerprints. Wish I could say it reads first time every time, but it works a high percentage of the time and I'm happy with it. I tried another brand fingerprint reader and it was successful maybe only 10% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Gary RV_Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent & inexpensive biometric device
customer_reviews.text: The P2000 is inexpensive and works very well. Accurate fingerprint reader. In cuded Roboform password software is not all that great.
customer_reviews.author: David K Story

customer_reviews.title: Great device, I've bought two
customer_reviews.text: Great device, I've bought two, one for each computer. Very reliable scanning operation, one failed after a few months and was serviced and returned quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Hectord

customer_reviews.title: Fast and accurate, easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and have no complaints. I set one up on Windows 7 with no problems (requires drivers/app from their included disk or download from their website). I installed the other one on a a Windows 8.1 computer, which is doesn't require any drivers/app as everything is built into Windows 8.1. I've configured it for multiple family members, including my 83 year father. It seems very fast and accurate - very rarely someone has to do a second swipe to unlock the computer. I've been a long time RoboForm user as well and this is as easy to setup with RoboForm as checking a single checkbox.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It is great solid product. The reader makes signing in real easy. But keep in mind, it is a sign-in option. Windows 10 at this time still requires you to set up a password even if you want to rely entirely on a biometric reader for sign in. If Microsoft were to do away with that readers will take off like a rocket.
customer_reviews.author: HARDINACK R.

customer_reviews.title: I'll keep the one for the office but will find a replacement for the one at home which is wasted money.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these, one for office & one for home. One works flawlessly but one is a constant problem. Have to unplug & re-plug frequently to use it. 3 time today. I'll keep the one for the office but will find a replacement for the one at home which is wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: W. M. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: ... have to reboot your system then it will work fine for another five or six times
customer_reviews.text: I have had this fingerprint reader for a month or six weeks if you leave your computer on or put it to sleep it will work five or six times and you then have to reboot your system then it will work fine for another five or six times. It is a bigger pain than its worth.I have since stopped using it and start thinking about sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell W Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: What an absolute waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I would give this fingerprint reader zero stars if I could! I have a new desk top with Windows 10 installed. I hooked up the fingerprint reader and it worked for the first couple of days. Then, it worked every now and then. Now it never works. What an absolute waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L. Kleinschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint reader correctly reads your fingerprints, on Windows 7. It does not work (and is not advertised to work) on Windows 8. The fingerprint reader itself is a bit difficult to use, taking up a fair amount of desk space to scan one's fingers. It's useless on laptops. The RoboForm password manager software is terrible. It simply doesn't work well with today's security systems. I could get it to work on about 30% of the websites that require passwords. Any website that uses a token or an image as a part of the login process would not work for me. Then, one has to upgrade to a substandard product. I don't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: D. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: You'll never forget your fingerprints!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a quality reader. I like it very much since I have a hefty PW on my computer it's such a pleasure to just swipe any of my 10 digits and log on to Windows. Am a little disappointed in the software for accessing web sites but it works, some of the time. Logs on Windows all the time but won't work with my browser, Mozilla Seamonkey. Likes Firefox but I don't use that program very often. Tried to load other fingerprint software but none would load on the computer, so I'm stuck with ROBO. For simply logging on to a Wiindows machine I give this a full five stars.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: All I needed to do is locate the search on windows 10 and type FINGER. I located the "set up for for fingerprint set up" and clicked on it to get the program started. It took 4 swipes to get a perfect finger ID. I can't believe how fast I can get into Windows.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchy

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great on Windows 7 64-bit with preexisting Roboform Everywhere installation. Easy setup; read the pdf or ReadMe text file instruction guide on the provided install disk before plugging the scanner into your computer. This is my first fingerprint reader, and I am happy with it; it is a time-saver.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Works after months in a very dirty environment!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for a few months at a branch office my company owns that deals in hoses. The folks there have very grimy hands and we were concerned this wouldn't hold up in that environment. It's been about 3 months now and they use this to login to a Windows 7 POS system dozens of times a day with fingerprint swipes by multiple employees and it continues to work very well. We're about to order a bunch more to distribute to other branches now that we see they are holding up so well.
customer_reviews.author: G. Widener

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after a month or two
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 months. Was working fine before and now I can't return it. Frustrating enough to actually make me write a review. Update: It started working again randomly but I ca n't give it higher than 3 stars because there was really no reason for it to be faulty in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Dipo Lawal

customer_reviews.title: A great fingerprint scanner for Windows 10 desktop
customer_reviews.text: Great for windows 10, RoboForm and any other Windows Biometric Framework apps. The device is metal and substantial. Unlike other reviewers I don't find any problem at all with it moving while scanning. It works perfectly and I say the number of times I have had to scan again I could count on one hand after nearly a month of use. I have 4 fingers scanned (2 each hand) and they all work.
customer_reviews.author: bogometer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and setup - Windows 8
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this on a Windows 8 machine in a few minutes with no problems whatsoever. The instructions were very clear, and as long as you follow them exactly, there should be no issues. Everything MUST be done in the correct sequence. The software and drivers make it easy to register your fingerprints using a graphic display of a hand, where you select a finger, swipe it 3 times, and you're done. Linked easily to my RoboForm software as well. What a breeze to use, instead of memorizing and typing a long master password with upper and lower case letters, numbers and symbols!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day, works well with Windows 10. Very premium feel to it compared to cheaper USB thumb devices. Works with Lastpass, Roboform, Windows 10 login (hello)..
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Nothing not to like. Nice sturdy feel. Gets me on Win10 immediately. No worries about having people seeing my paasword.
customer_reviews.author: ILKamazon

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan, and glitchy.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Often glitchy. Sometimes wanted real slow swipe, sometimes wanted fast swipe, sometimes wanted me to press firmly on sensor, sometimes wanted me to not press firmly. And, it suddenly stopped working after 14 months.
customer_reviews.author: Saverio Mercurio

customer_reviews.title: Completely unreliable- wasted my time
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge waste of time. I can't it to reliably read my fingerprint after repeated swiping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Above the rest
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! The readings are accurate and swift. Works with Plug and Play for Windows 8.1 flawlessly. I highly recommend this device! I previously tried other biometric fingerprint readers with average satisfaction. I would also recommend using a form/password management application to make the most of the device capabilities. I have been using this device with Roboform for several months with great satisfaction!
customer_reviews.author: VonCount

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: works better than I expect based on the reviews. I have had just a little problem with it recognizing me, but as long as you run your finger the same way each time, it works 9 out of 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: ray u mills

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint scanning for passwords is fantastic addition to any computer.
customer_reviews.text: Software and driver was a bit difficult but once setup this works great on my Win7 computer. Just scan my finger and I am logged in securely. Works well with LASTPASS to secure and save my hundreds of user passwords. Never have to remember a password again and have ultimated password security. Quality build and very reliable, rarely have to scan more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Serendipity

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on websites
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get it to work for websites. It worked perfectly for Windows login on my Windows 8.1. I installed the 64bit drivers first and followed the directions. I also installed Roboform but it didn't support the Verifi reader. The options to configure the reader to work with websites were greyed out. I emailed Roboform and they said this reader was not supported.
customer_reviews.author: BLKDRGN

customer_reviews.title: I can say this was a good choice. It is easy to install and has ...
customer_reviews.text: I spent quite some time before chosing a fingerprint reader that meets my expectations. Verifi P2000 fingerprint reader works well with all my Win 7k computers. After few weeks of experience, I can say this was a good choice. It is easy to install and has a good integration with Roboform. It has a solid design and works to my satisfaction. This product has excellent value for money. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Ever had that time where you wish you can just log into your computer without typing in your password. Well this is a great product for you. Very easy to setup and your in business. No need to type in your password anymore. Just swipe a finger and your logged on. This product also looks pleasing to the eye, very nice chrome/plastic finish.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I have two. One on laptop and one on desktop. Both running Win 10 and RoboForm.. Easy to setup. Be sure to read instructions. If running Win10 it is just plug and play. After two weeks running flawlessly. Will up date if needed,
customer_reviews.author: sideliner

customer_reviews.title: Does not work reliably
customer_reviews.text: This device is a piece of garbage. It is totally intermittent and works maybe 30% of the time. Don't waste your money on this one!
customer_reviews.author: haman

customer_reviews.title: I myself like the fact that my tv/monitor base stand is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for startups of windows, makes sure I am the one using the computer since only those that have a finger print are able to access, makes it hard for a key logger to monitor all your activities, I myself like the fact that my tv/monitor base stand is a flat surface area, and the reader that is hooked at the end sets flat on edge of stand, makes it stable and reader stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint reader is very accurate, relatively inexpensive and doesn't need any additional drivers or software to work with Windows 8.1. Included RoboForm trial software is very cumbersome to use and has a very unfriendly user interface, so it is practically worthless. In comparison, HP SimplePass software included with the built-in fingerprint scanner of my HP Laptop is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with Windows 10! I use this for logging into my computer and it's awesome! I just turn the computer on or restart it ... I don't have to click on anything, just swipe my finger and it logs me own immediately using Hello.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Work nice but mine came used. I returned and buy another one this one came new. Work amazing
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Stil working perfect months later
customer_reviews.text: This thing was simple to install and train and if works every single time. My single complaint is it's weight. Its light so it can move easily. Perhaps sticky feet or magnetic feet would fix the issue. Then it could easily be mounted on top of a PC case or desk.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great product. easy install on Windows 7 and used ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. easy install on Windows 7 and used with Roboform makes a great way to protect and sign in to sites ID/Sign. Used with Roboform, 1 swipe can fill in a whole page on those sites where you have to enter lines and lines of information (your info, ship to, payment info, etc) 1 swipe of the finger and it's done. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rdys

customer_reviews.title: Not cool at all
customer_reviews.text: Where are the directions??? this is not user-friendly at all and for this price, there should at least be something that isn't a cluster *** come on! what a waste of money SO DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Kblack

customer_reviews.title: i like it, after 3 years the end of the ...
customer_reviews.text: i like it, after 3 years the end of the usb cable fails to connect some times. -1 star because it doesn't look nice and durability. I don't really unplug/replug the cable that much it's clearly faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Hernan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product, Great Tech Support
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for signing in without needing pin or password. Also customer support was VERY helpful, CORI was her name. I had a problem setting up product, turns out user error. CORI helped this old timer get things running.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN J SEMER

customer_reviews.title: Works with not hiccups (so far)
customer_reviews.text: It works. Windows automatically downloaded the driver. The included small-sized CD contains Roboform and some instructions. To get the best out of this fingerprint scanner, you really need to play around with the software "Roboform" and Windows (which is not the fingerprint scanner's fault).
customer_reviews.author: Chi Ho

customer_reviews.title: Got to have It!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, great price! Highly recommend. It comes with trial version of Robo form software to memorize your password and user id on all your websites, etc. Tech support for fingerprint reader is the best I ever had! They step you through the install process if you have trouble. (My issue was my lack of knowledge, not the product!)
customer_reviews.author: BILL

customer_reviews.title: not completely compatible with win 7 in all cases
customer_reviews.text: This device, contrary to description, does not work with all installations of windows 7. This was confirmed with the manufacture's tech support. They recommended I return it to Amazon or upgrade to win 8 or win 10. Not ready to upgrade yet so will return the device. Customer support was excellent, very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Dallas

customer_reviews.title: This works great on my Windows 10 desktop
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my Windows 10 desktop. I'm so glad I don't have to type in passwords when my session times out.
customer_reviews.author: SSako53

customer_reviews.title: easy and fast setup
customer_reviews.text: easy and fast setup! login with just a swipe. Would be dang nice if it also auto logged into browser passwords
customer_reviews.author: Phil C.

customer_reviews.title: Install Instructions Hard to Find for Windows 8.1
customer_reviews.text: It turns out it is not hard to install this device once you find the right instructions for Windows 8.1. The device did install automatically but to actually register your prints you need to find correct links. [...] This web link has the instructions you need to register your prints. After that it seems to work great.
customer_reviews.author: ARMELIA SNYDER

customer_reviews.title: This product works as advertised. I got this for ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised. I got this for my birthday to restrict access to my computer and LastPass account. It saves time when you normally have to enter in a 32+ character password. I have yet to have an issue with it reading my prints.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint scanner makes life Bliss
customer_reviews.text: Having a fingerprint scanner has made my life so much better. Now when I go to log on to sites I swipe my finger no more typing in login password BS!
customer_reviews.author: Couros Vade

customer_reviews.title: it works !!
customer_reviews.text: This product actually works. Forget the software, just plug it in and let Windows Hello do it's thing. After failure with a cheaper competitor, I'll give the P2000 five stars.
customer_reviews.author: captcowboy

customer_reviews.title: good quility good price
customer_reviews.text: really like fingerprint reader came fast and it's made well use my finger to get on my computer and web, comes with RoboForm it keeps pass words safe and will fill password after I swipe my finger I like the little bar you swipe finger better then the window finger print reader by microsoft
customer_reviews.author: boons26

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fingerprint reader after our company went to a minimum 12-digit password with 5 minute timeout. This thing has worked perfectly. I knocked it down one star only because they put a paper sticker on the USB plug warning you to install the drivers before plugging the reader in. It took longer to clean the paper sticker and adhesive off of the plug than to actually install the reader. A vinyl sticker would have won them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: 2N

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy so it stays put on my desk
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly the very first time I plugged it into my Windows 10 desktop. No drivers needed either, at least not for Win10; I just went straight to the Windows login settings page and the device was already there. Nice and heavy so it stays put on my desk, and the USB cord is decently long. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Todd W.

customer_reviews.title: Worked as I expcted
customer_reviews.text: Works good on Windows 10. Long time user of RoboForm and it works great with RF too.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and accurate. My old FP scanner took a bunch of tries to get it to work or wake it up (not sure which). This thing is fast and responsive. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: steelew

customer_reviews.title: I very good product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the reader today. Connected to my computer (Win10) and it wasn't recognized. But .......... after I updated the computer the reader became friends with Win10. Tried it now for 20 times (reboot and reboot) and it works fantastic!! Everytime at first swipe it recognised me and Windows opened. Greetings from a very happy customer in Austria. (europe)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Works great for logging in to Windows... doesn't log me into websites ;(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could log into my websites on Chrome (Windows 8.1) with my finger. Instead, it only logs me into Windows. I can't figure out what's wrong. I followed the instructions for 8.1 but swiping my finger on log-in screens does nothing to websites. If I'm an idiot and you can help me I'd be happy to change my rating...
customer_reviews.author: Drew's Clues Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Single swipe logins to my Windows 8 computer (mostly)
customer_reviews.text: I have a long password so this was a great addition to my PC. It works on the first try about 75% of the time. The key for me is to go slow and clean the reader every few weeks. I have another PC that uses facial recognition but I much prefer this fingerprint reader.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with Windows 7 Pro
customer_reviews.text: I installed this several months ago on my desktop simply because I did not like typing my password in every log in, i love it and it has not failed once. It was easy to install and get set up. I really, really recommend it. I use HP laptops for work and they all have this feature built in and I wanted it at my house, this was the best choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: griffallo

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint reader
customer_reviews.text: I don't go to a lot of sites for login and mainly wanted it for windows 10 log in, and this little device is nice and seems well build and works well. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: OnyxTalon

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Installed it on a machine with both ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Installed it on a machine with both Windows 7 and Windows 10. It works nearly automatically with Win 10s "Hello" features. The Win 7 software works acceptably well (a little slow perhaps).
customer_reviews.author: Palace 86

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fingerprint scanner, good quality, wire gets in my way on the Y700 15ACZ.
customer_reviews.author: thegaddprince

customer_reviews.title: TIME SAVER
customer_reviews.text: Accessing sites that require logon info. and passwords couldn't be easier now that swiping a finger is all I have to do to log on securely. The device does not slide around either or mark up my desktop. It stays put throughout swipes.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Brown

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat swiping a finger to log in. Bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat swiping a finger to log in. Bought it for a Windows 7 computer but when I updated to Windows 10 it stopped working. Turns out this was a Windows 10 issue and I found a registry entry change that fixed the problem.
customer_reviews.author: daveb

customer_reviews.title: One swipe and you are in.
customer_reviews.text: Works well with Windows 10 "Hello" app. Even opens Roboform. You seldom have to swipe twice.
customer_reviews.author: John in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Works Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Device works great. I use it to log into windows automatically. I also use RoboForm to auto log into websites. No need to type passwords, I can now create 15+ character passwords for everything and not have to remember anything. Just make sure you download the latest 64bit drivers from their website. Microsoft drivers seem to be slow and have a high rate of false-negatives. Update: Windows 8.1 has all the necessary drivers and works great.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It works that is about it. not much to say register your fingerprint and swipe. I left a poor review but it is working fine now. I have no idea why it stopped for a bit but is up and running great now. It arrived fast and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tiare Dream

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS FINGERPRINT READER!
customer_reviews.text: This fingerprint reader is a tremendous time saver. I got excellent Tech Support from the company & now I can easily access many of the web-sites with just a swipe of my finger. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SANDKEYFRED

customer_reviews.title: Windows 7 Pro - Works Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a breeze, registering fingerprints was cake, and, like others have said, the metal construction gives it weight so it doesn't move around. I've been using it for about one week and it hasn't failed to read my fingerprint once. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Proverbs 3:5

customer_reviews.title: 100% unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to get this working. I have followed all the instructions, all the instructions from tech support, and it still will not work. I give up on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Stoll

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fingerprint reader
customer_reviews.text: Wow, works perfectly with both my desktop and laptop thru my KVM. Works better than my built in Toshiba fingerprint reader.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Howard

customer_reviews.title: easy log in from lock screen Windows
customer_reviews.text: Works very well with only a few misreads. easy log in from lock screen Windows 10
customer_reviews.author: Dennishh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use this on a PC running Windows 10. Don't ever have to type a password.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Grantom

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly with Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Fast Detection, faster than HP's Laptop built in finger print detector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately does not work with Windows 10 because the required Roboform app is not compatible with Windows 10. Besides Roboform free version only allows 10 sites in its memory. You must upgrade to paid version. Don't know what that entails since it won't work with my new operating system. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but have super long USB cord
customer_reviews.text: I ahve a few of these. Great quality but have super long USB cord. Would prefer a detachable one so I could use a smaller lead.
customer_reviews.author: aerolatte

customer_reviews.title: Faster signing in vs passwords.
customer_reviews.text: I luv it when I swipe my finger instead of typing my password at times. It does work.
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Better than the Fingerprint reader that was built into my old HP laptop. I use this with the full RoboForm software suite and couldn't be happier. If you log onto more than 4 websites a day, this will be a time saver.
customer_reviews.author: tinyt

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. Had to talk to tech support ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Had to talk to tech support to resolve a sleep issue. Some quirk in Win 10 was turning off the reader after a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary  Doerpinghaus

customer_reviews.title: Feels well constructed. Had to install drivers and software ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels well constructed. Had to install drivers and software to use with Windows 7 and 8/8.1 but setup was simple and easy
customer_reviews.author: padlam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works and it will do what it's suppose to do. Work Ok.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Scarbrbough

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: interface is easy to install and works with Windows 10
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Works on Windows 8
customer_reviews.text: Unlike several other fingerprint readers, this one works with Windows 8 and mostly it gets it the first time!
customer_reviews.author: Country Boy

customer_reviews.title: It was nice while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less than a week. It was nice while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Yurio M.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and Plug and Play with Windows 7
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to simplify accessing my password software. It works great. Windows 7 includes device drivers so it was very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jacie

customer_reviews.title: Works very well with Windows 10 native software.
customer_reviews.text: It works very well, and no software or driver needed with windows 10. Work with native windows finger login. Quick setup and use.
customer_reviews.author: Quang Chung

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint reader
customer_reviews.text: This device makes it a pleasure using very strong passwords without the hassle of having to type them in to access my computer. Teamed with RoboForm, it makes my system much more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: An excellent piece of technology. I use it for Windows hello on Windows 10
customer_reviews.author: Joe T

customer_reviews.title: It installs easily, integrates into Windows
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. It installs easily, integrates into Windows, and provides a quick secure means to unlock my computer. This means I can have my computer auto-lock and not worry about wasting a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Thanos1572

customer_reviews.title: This was a very unfriendly setup and I wasted 2-3 hours trying to make it work without success
customer_reviews.text: Although the Verifi P2000 worked , it did not add any more security or ease of use. This proved very difficult to set up and operate through LastPAss. First you must purchase the premium (or Pro) edition to add this feature, after doing this, I still could not figure out how to use it on a website. This was a very unfriendly setup and I wasted 2-3 hours trying to make it work without success, so I returned this unit to Amazon. Buyer beware, unless you have a full knowledge on how to set this up, don't go there!!
customer_reviews.author: George H. Speece

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Windows 7
customer_reviews.text: Works great with Windows 7. The included RoboForm password manager is also excellent and has an Android version for you phone or tablet Have not tried this with Windows 8.1 yet
customer_reviews.author: Soberic

product_meta.title: Verifi P2000 Premium Metal Fingerprint Reader for Windows 7/8/10
product_meta.description: Say goodbye to password hassles. Now you can log on to your computer and your favorite Web sites with the touch of your finger, without having to remember all those passwords - simply place your finger on the receiver whenever a password or username is required. Works only with Windows 7, 8 and 10. Does not work with Windows XP and Windows Vista. NOTE: Please disable anti-virus during install.
feature_bullets: Use this product for logon to Windows 7, 8 and 10 including Windows Hello
Comes with Roboform Free Edition password manager for fingerprint logon to websites and applications
One finger access to your PC
State of the art silicon slide sensor in an all-metal housing
CD included with Quick Start guide, drivers and RoboForm Free Edition

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars280 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
